titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for taking prizes at sea in the time of this rebellion.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Oxford, the ninth day of May, in the twentieth yeare of Our Reigne.
With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Thomason copy cropped at foot; imprint from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
